name: Ice Hockey Heroes
description:
Hockey is a rapid and rough game. Are you ready for it?

Kick it old school with the latest game Ice Hockey Hero! Defeat Rivals! Win the League! Become a Hockey Legend!
Skate like hell and move between strikers, defenders and tough guys to score a GOAL! Eliminate the hockey player with your arsenal of super hockey tricks and avoid getting hip checked or hit at all costs! Superb animation and charismatic characters make this a game you won’t forget in a hurry
Enjoy pixel art-Inspired Game Play!
Race Through Diverse staduims, rinks and Weather Conditions!
Unlock dozens of jerseys, teams, clubs Each with Unique Super Moves!
Earn Coins and Rewards to beat Your Friends' High Scores!
PLay The best single-player Hockey game
